title: Clinical Competency Enhancement Course Based on Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic nursing theories and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Practice-centered training course for corporate nursing education coordinators or prospective nursing instructors

learning_goals: Patient safety-centered nursing interventions can be applied with 80% accuracy in a simulation environment.
Emergency response procedures can be successfully performed three or more times using high-fidelity simulation equipment.

Learners self-evaluate simulation performance results in three or more specific categories (e.g., patient safety protocols, communication, technical proficiency) during a 10-minute debriefing session, establish two or more improvement plans, and submit a checklist.
Role allocation and communication strategies are effectively executed two or more times in team-based simulations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
